subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ignacio Garrido of Spain shot a par 72 to take a three-stroke lead into the final round of the Spanish Open. Garrido led Miguel Ángel Jiménez (67) with a 15-under total of 201.
snippet: Ignacio Garrido of Spain shot a par 72 to take a three-stroke lead into the final round of the Spanish Open. Garrido led Miguel Ángel Jiménez (67) with a 15-under total of 201.
